DESIGN

GO IN STYLE

The Mazda CX-30 creates a constantly shifting S-curve along the doors, capturing the interplay of light and shadow and
reflecting a sense of movement—even at a standstill.

UTILITY FOR ANY ACTIVITY

and premium stitching to
sophisticated color palettes, our
supportive seats are designed to
enhance your drive.

vehicle is accentuated by the new
Aero Gray exterior color, available
for the CX-30.

Available Turbo Model

CX-30 2.5 Turbo models feature eye-catching accents
including a Black accented grille and durable Black
roof rails for more cargo carrying options.

PERFORMANCE

GO SWIFTLY, GO CONFIDENTLY

Feel confident and empowered behind the wheel with effortless control and features like standard i-Activ AWD ®. 

2025 Mazda 2.5 S Premium with options shown.

i-Activ AWD®

Standard i-Activ AWD® responds to changing conditions and delivers
power to the right wheels at the right time to give you responsive
performance.4

Skyactiv-G 2.5L Turbo Engine

The available 2.5-liter turbo engine offers up to 250 hp and 320 lb-ft
of torque 5for a level of performance you might not expect.

G-Vectoring Control Plus

G-Vectoring Control Plus responds to steering inputs with subtle
engine torque and braking adjustments, providing enhanced stability
for a smoother drive.

TECHNOLOGY

INTEGRATED SOLUTIONS

Stay connected and focused with technology that enhances your driving experience like an available 10.25-inch infotainment
screen and the intuitive Commander Control knob.

ALEXA BUILT-IN

Connect to your maps, climate control, music and more–using just your voice.
Available Alexa Built-in allows you to focus on the road and what’s ahead of you. 8

MAZDA CONNECTED SERVICES

Remotely start your engine, check status reports and more through the MyMazda
App with Mazda Connected Services, complimentary for one year. 9

SAFETY

STAY FOCUSED AND SECURE

The i-Activsense ® suite of safety features alerts you to hazards, helps you avoid collisions or lessen their impact. 11

Smart Brake Support - Reverse
